props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our Composition guide for more details.

props.name: color
props.description: Overrides the accent color inherited from the Theme.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The pressed state of the toggle when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the toggle.

props.name: highContrast
props.description: Uses a higher contrast color for the component.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled pressed state of the toggle. Can be bind as v-model.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: radius
props.description: Overrides the radius inherited from the theme.

props.name: required
props.description: When true, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.
